title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Short-Term Business Leader Language Proficiency via Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize core business meeting English expressions with 80% accuracy within one week
Learners can write three work-related English emails through collaborative projects with peers and receive revision feedback
Learners demonstrate communication efficiency by operating digital tools (video conferencing platforms, etc.) at 90% utilization rate in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
